welcome.title: Welcome to Our Hospital!
welcome.subtitle: An Integrated Healthcare System with Modern Facility, Where You Live
welcome.description_1: We are a team of highly skilled and experienced healthcare professionals dedicated to providing the highest quality care to our patients. Our clinic offers a wide range of medical services, from routine check-ups to complex surgeries. We are committed to delivering exceptional patient care and making a positive impact on the health and well-being of our community.
welcome.description_2: Our Hospital is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and modern facilities, ensuring that our patients receive the best possible care. We are committed to providing exceptional patient care and making a positive impact on the health and well-being of our community.
welcome.description_3: Our team of experienced healthcare professionals is dedicated to providing personalized attention and compassionate care to each patient. We strive to create a welcoming and supportive environment that makes our patients feel at ease.

departments.title: Our Departments
departments.subtitle: Discover Our Medical Services
departments.eqp_details: Our equipment is designed to provide the best possible experience for our customers. We have a wide range of modern equipment that is designed to provide the best possible experience for our customers.

csr.title: Our CSR Initiatives
csr.community-description: We actively engage with our community by organizing free medical camps, health checkups, and wellness programs for underserved populations.
csr.education-description: Spreading awareness about health and hygiene through educational programs is one of our primary objectives. We partner with schools and NGOs to empower communities with knowledge.
csr.environment-description: We are committed to reducing our carbon footprint by adopting eco-friendly practices and supporting reforestation efforts.
csr.disaster-description: During times of natural disasters, we provide essential medical aid, food, and support to affected communities to help them recover and rebuild.
csr.cta-title: Join Us in Making a Difference
csr.cta-description: We believe in the power of collective efforts. Partner with us to create a positive impact and make the world a healthier, happier place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What are your hospital's visiting hours?
faq.a1: Our visiting hours are from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM daily.
faq.q2: How can I book an appointment?
faq.a2: You can book an appointment online or by calling our reception desk.
faq.q4: What insurance providers do you work with?
faq.a4: We accept most major insurance providers. Please contact us for specific details.
faq.q5: Do you have a pharmacy on-site?
faq.a5: Yes, we have a fully equipped pharmacy within the hospital premises.
faq.q6: How do I find a specialist?
faq.a6: You can find a specialist by visiting our 'Find a Doctor' section on the website.
faq.q7: What are the payment options available?
faq.a7: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and online payments.
faq.a8: Yes, we have a 24/7 ambulance service available.
faq.a9: Yes, appointments can be rescheduled by contacting our reception.
faq.q10: What are the charges for a general consultation?
faq.a10: General consultation charges vary depending on the department. Please contact us for details.
faq.a11: Yes, we have a diagnostic lab offering a range of medical tests.
faq.q12: Is parking available at the hospital?
faq.a12: Yes, we provide free parking for all patients and visitors.
faq.q13: Can I get a medical certificate from the hospital?
faq.a13: Yes, medical certificates are provided upon request after a consultation.
faq.q14: Do you offer health check-up packages?
faq.a14: Yes, we offer a variety of health check-up packages tailored to your needs.
faq.q15: Is Wi-Fi available at the hospital?
faq.a15: Yes, complimentary Wi-Fi is available for all patients and visitors.
faq.a16: Yes, we have comprehensive maternity and child care services.
faq.q17: What COVID-19 safety measures are in place?
faq.a17: We follow strict COVID-19 protocols, including regular sanitization and temperature checks.
faq.q18: How can I request my medical records?
faq.a18: Medical records can be requested at our medical records department.
faq.q19: Are meals provided for admitted patients?
faq.a19: Yes, we provide nutritious meals based on the patient's dietary requirements.
faq.q20: Do you have specialist doctors available on weekends?
faq.a20: Yes, specialist doctors are available on weekends. Please book an appointment in advance.
